I want to talk to the manager
Can you connect me with a real person?
I want an agent to help me
I dont want to talk to a computer
I would like to speak to a human
I don't want to talk to you

I want to talk to a person
I would like to speak to someone
Can you assist me to connect to an agent?
Please connect me to a live agent

i'd like to come in for an appointment
do you have availability next week
i'd like to make an appointment

workspace.description: Sample simple customer service skill to get you started.

values: We only accept appointments between 11am and 5pm

output.text: What time on <? $date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> do you want to come in?

values: Perfect!
Sorry... let's try again

output.text: Let me confirm: You want an appointment for <? $date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> at <? $time.reformatDateTime("h a") ?>. Is this correct?

values: Hello
Hi there
Hi. How can I help
Hello. Good evening
Hi. Good evening
Hello. How can I help this evening?
Hello. Good afternoon
Hi there. It's a beautiful afternoon
Good afternoon. How can I help?
Hello. Good morning
It's a beautiful morning. Hello
Hi there. How can I help you this morning?
Thanks

output.text: I'll just need a phone to hold your reservation

values: Our hours on <? @sys-date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> are 11am to 6pm.
We are open on <? @sys-date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> from 10am until 8pm
We are open on @holiday regular hours
Our hours are Monday to Friday 10am to 8pm and Friday and Saturday 11am to 6pm.
We are closed on @holiday
To get to our business from Times Square, take the N train downtown to Union Square
To get to our business from Grand Central, take the 4,5 or 6 train downtown to Union Square.
To get to our business from the Empire State Building, walk to Herald Square and take the N train to Union Square
We're located by Union Square on the corner of 13th and Broadway
Looks like you're trying to make a reservation in the past. Try again.

output.text: What day would you like to come in?

values: Let me check availability...  [Use IBM Cloud Functions to connect to backend systems]
[Use IBM Cloud Functions to connect to to backend systems]
Let me know how else I can help
OK. Canceling your request...
I see you need help making an appointment. Let me transfer you to an agent...
We'll do our best to book you with @specialist

output.text: OK. Let me know how I can help

values: OK. Transferring... [Use IBM Cloud Functions to connect to backend systems]
I didn't understand can you try again
So long
See ya
Good bye
You're welcome. Just let me know if you need anything else
No problem. Just let me know if you need anything else
My pleasure. Just let me know if you need anything else

dialog_nodes.title: I want to make an appointment
Please transfer me to an agent

values: Would you like me to transfer you to a representative?

values.text: I can tell you about our store locations and opening hours, or help you set up an appointment.
You could also ask me to connect you to an agent.

values: Hello, I’m a demo customer care virtual assistant to show you the basics.  I can help with directions to my store, hours of operation and booking an in-store appointment
